title: Profs - Sem 2 phy cycle
content:
KAVYASHREE (Math)

R.VASUDEV IYER (Phy)

PRASANNA KUMAR (EEE)

SANGAMESH (Mechanical)

how are these profs?

comments.body: RV Iyer is the goat. I barely studied physics but just listened in class and got an A. He'll do every lengthy derivation in class and is super passionate about the subject and it shows in his teaching. One of the best profs I've come across in PES.
math prof is good just co operate in class
